            "description": "Duke, a taxi driver, is hailed by a group of wealthy men who request to be taken to the waterfront to meet their yacht, the Marlin. While driving, Duke becomes aware of a sedan following his taxi and recognizes it as a G-Man's car, causing him to wonder about their intentions.
